lines.text: create integers n , m , x , y , kol , q , l , r , with kol = 0 , q = 0
lines.code: int n , m , x , y , kol = 0 , q = 0 , l , r ;

lines.text: create pair of ( integer , integer ) arrays a , b , c , with a size 100000 b size 100000 c size 100000
read n read m read x read y

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: read first element of a [ i ]
set second element of a [ i ] to i + 1

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < m ; i ++ )

lines.text: read first element of b [ i ]
set second element of b [ i ] to i + 1
sort elements from a to a + n
sort elements from b to b + m
for l is less than n and r is less than m
if first element of a [ l ] - x is less than or equal to first element of b [ r ] and first element of b [ r ] is less than or equal to first element of a [ l ] + y
lines.code: if ( a [ l ] . first - x <= b [ r ] . first && b [ r ] . first <= a [ l ] . first + y )

lines.text: set first element of c [ q ] to second element of a [ l ]
lines.code: c [ q ] . first = a [ l ] . second ;

lines.text: set second element of c [ q ] to second element of b [ r ]
lines.code: c [ q ] . second = b [ r ] . second ;

lines.text: if first element of a [ l ] - x is greater than first element of b [ r ]
lines.code: if ( a [ l ] . first - x > b [ r ] . first )

lines.text: for i = 0 to kol exclusive , print first element of c [ i ] print ' ' print second element of c [ i ] print " \ n "
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < kol ; i ++ ) cout << c [ i ] . first << ' ' << c [ i ] . second << " \n " ;
